p: This study used a structural modeling approach developed by International Food Policy Research Institute (IFPRI) under the Global Futures and Strategic Foresight program. In this approach, we integrated a geospatially coordinated suite of biophysical, socioeconomic models with process-based biophysical and partial equilibrium economic models ( Islam et al., 2016; Robinson et al., 2015a, Robinson et al., 2015b) to assess the impact of climate change on groundnut in India.
